name: Stfalcon
description: Stfalcon is a software development company with a focus on logistics, travel, healthcare and e-commerce solutions. Our web solutions are based on Symfony framework, our mobile teams handle  cross platform and iOS / Android native application development. We work with the top private parcel delivery service in Ukraine, delivered applications for the largest German bus tickets operator and helped many companies to grow with our development effort. Get in touch with us so we can help you!
